# Sample Industrial Test Document
# Used for RAG pipeline testing

## PLC Troubleshooting Guide

### Common PLC Faults

1. **Communication Loss**
   - Check Ethernet/Profinet cable connections
   - Verify IP address configuration
   - Check PLC CPU status LEDs
   - Review firewall settings on network switches

2. **I/O Module Failures**
   - Verify power supply voltage (24VDC typical)
   - Check wiring connections
   - Replace faulty modules
   - Update module firmware

3. **Program Execution Errors**
   - Check scan time watchdog settings
   - Review error logs in the PLC diagnostics
   - Verify memory allocation
   - Check for infinite loops in user program

### SCADA Alarm Interpretation

| Alarm Code | Description | Priority | Action Required |
|-----------|-------------|----------|----------------|
| ALM-001 | High Temperature | Critical | Immediate investigation |
| ALM-002 | Low Pressure | High | Check pump status |
| ALM-003 | Communication Timeout | Medium | Verify network |
| ALM-004 | Sensor Out of Range | Low | Schedule calibration |

### Predictive Maintenance Indicators

- Vibration levels exceeding 7.1 mm/s RMS indicate bearing wear
- Motor current deviation > 15% from baseline suggests load issues
- Temperature rise > 10Â°C above normal operating range requires investigation
